name: Hotel Basics
description: Common hotel-related words and phrases for check-ins, room services, and travel situations.

vocabularies.definition: The front desk where guests check in and ask for help.
vocabularies.sentence: I went to the reception to check in.

translations.translated_sentence: 私はフロントでチェックインしました。
translations.sentence_transliteration: Watashi wa furonto de chekku-in shimashita.

translations.translated_sentence: 我去前台办理入住。
translations.sentence_transliteration: Wǒ qù qiántái bàn lùzhù.

vocabularies.definition: A card used to open your hotel room.
vocabularies.sentence: I took the key card to my room.

translations.translated_sentence: 私は部屋に行くためにキーカードを取りました。
translations.sentence_transliteration: Watashi wa heya ni iku tame ni kī kādo o torimashita.

translations.translated_sentence: 我拿了房卡去我的房间。
translations.sentence_transliteration: Wǒ ná le fángkǎ qù wǒ de fángjiān.

vocabularies.definition: The process of registering at a hotel.
vocabularies.sentence: I arrived early to check in.

translations.translated_sentence: 私は早くチェックインしました。
translations.sentence_transliteration: Watashi wa hayaku chekku-in shimashita.

translations.translated_sentence: 我提前到达办理入住。
translations.sentence_transliteration: Wǒ tíqián dàodá bàn lùzhù.

vocabularies.definition: Service that delivers food or items to your hotel room.
vocabularies.sentence: I ordered breakfast through room service.

translations.translated_sentence: 私はルームサービスで朝食を注文しました。
translations.sentence_transliteration: Watashi wa rūmu sābisu de chōshoku o chūmon shimashita.

translations.translated_sentence: 我通过客房服务订了早餐。
translations.sentence_transliteration: Wǒ tōngguò kèfáng fúwù dìng le zǎocān.

vocabularies.definition: Bags and suitcases that travelers bring.
vocabularies.sentence: I carried my luggage to the room.

translations.translated_sentence: 私は荷物を部屋に運びました。
translations.sentence_transliteration: Watashi wa nimotsu o heya ni hakobimashita.

translations.translated_sentence: 我把行李搬到房间。
translations.sentence_transliteration: Wǒ bǎ xínglǐ bān dào fángjiān.

vocabularies.definition: An arrangement made in advance to secure a hotel room.

translations.translated_sentence: 私はオンラインで予約を確認しました。
translations.sentence_transliteration: Watashi wa onrain de yoyaku o kakunin shimashita.

translations.translated_sentence: 我在网上确认了预订。
translations.sentence_transliteration: Wǒ zài wǎngshàng quèrèn le yùdìng.

vocabularies.definition: A machine for moving between floors in a building.
vocabularies.sentence: I took the elevator to the fifth floor.

translations.translated_sentence: 私はエレベーターで5階に行きました。
translations.sentence_transliteration: Watashi wa erebētā de go-kai ni ikimashita.

translations.translated_sentence: 我坐电梯去五楼。
translations.sentence_transliteration: Wǒ zuò diàntī qù wǔ lóu.

vocabularies.definition: An arrangement made in advance to secure a hotel room.
